Name: Lucky Lily Margarita
Ingredients: 15 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of pineapple wedge and black pepper.
Garnish with pineapple wedge dusted with black pepper placed on the rim.
Review: Spicy tequila and pineapple tingle with balance and flavour.
History: Adapted from a  honeyed pineapple and pepper riff on a classic Margarita discovered in 2006 at All Star Lanes, London, England.
